title: Echo Dot (4th Gen) | Smart speaker with Alexa | Charcoal
description: Meet the all-new Echo Dot - Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. The sleek, compact design delivers crisp vocals and balanced bass for full sound.
features: Improved speaker quality - Better speaker quality than Echo Dot Gen 3 for richer and louder sound.
Voice control your music - Stream songs from Amazon Music, Apple Music, Spotify, SiriusXM, and others.
Ready to help - Ask Alexa to play music, answer questions, read the news, check the weather, set alarms, control compatible smart home devices, and more.
Connect with others - Call almost anyone hands-free. Instantly drop in on other rooms or make an announcement throughout your home with your other Echo devices.

title: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) with MagSafe Case (USB-C)
description: AirPods Pro (2nd generation) with MagSafe Case (USB-C) deliver up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous AirPods Pro.
features: Up to 2x more Active Noise Cancellation than the previous AirPods Pro
Adaptive Transparency lets outside sounds in while reducing loud environmental noise
Personalized Spatial Audio with dynamic head tracking places sound all around you
Multiple ear tips (XS, S, M, L) for a customizable fit

title: Kindle Scribe (16 GB) – the first Kindle and digital notebook, all in one
description: Kindle Scribe is the first Kindle for reading and writing, with a 10.2" 300 ppi Paperwhite display, and includes a Basic Pen.
features: The first Kindle for reading and writing - Turn any book into a notebook and write directly on the page
10.2" 300 ppi Paperwhite display - The largest, highest resolution display of any Kindle
Basic Pen included - Write in books, take notes, or journal in notebooks. Battery-free pen, no charging required
Converts handwriting to text - Easily share and search your notes within your notebook

title: Fire TV Stick 4K Max streaming device, Wi-Fi 6, Alexa Voice Remote
description: Powerful streaming in 4K Ultra HD - enjoy a fast, smooth streaming experience with 40% more power than Fire TV Stick 4K.
features: 40% more powerful than Fire TV Stick 4K for fast streaming in 4K Ultra HD
Support for Wi-Fi 6 provides faster streaming and fewer dropped connections
Cinematic experience - Watch in vibrant 4K Ultra HD with support for Dolby Vision, HDR10, and Dolby Atmos audio
Alexa Voice Remote - Use your voice to search and launch content with the Alexa Voice Remote

title: Nintendo Switch with Neon Blue and Neon Red Joy‑Con
description: 3 Play Styles: TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode. 6.2-inch, multi-touch capacitive touch screen.
features: 3 Play Styles: TV Mode, Tabletop Mode, Handheld Mode
6.2-inch, multi-touch capacitive touch screen
4.5-9+ Hours of Battery Life will vary depending on software usage conditions
Connects over Wi-Fi for multiplayer gaming up to 8 consoles

title: Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro True Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
description: Escape into your music with Samsung Galaxy Buds2 Pro. Our most intelligent earbuds yet cancel out distracting noises.
features: Intelligent Active Noise Cancellation blocks out unwanted noise
Enhanced 360 Audio puts you at the center of the action
Comfortable, secure fit designed to stay put during your day
Up to 29 hours total battery life with case
